src:
BG takes on LSU
07 Nov 2019, 11:30 by EndPlay
BATON ROUGE, La. - Bowling Green (1-0) vs. LSU (0-0)
Pete Maravich Assembly Center, Baton Rouge, Louisiana; Friday, 8 p.m. EST
BOTTOM LINE: LSU plays Bowling Green in an early season matchup. Bowling Green won easily 94-73 at home against Tiffin on Tuesday. LSU went 28-7 last year and finished first in the SEC.
DID YOU KNOW: Both of these teams posted winning records against non-conference competition last season. Bowling Green went 6-5 against schools outside its conference, while LSU went 12-4 in such games.
___
For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP_Top25
___
